sentences.en: A glove stretcher makes gloves larger.
sentences.cn: 手套撑架可以把手套撑张得大些.

sentences.en: An ambulance officer brought a stretcher for the injured woman.
sentences.cn: 救护车工作人员带来了一副担架抢救那位受伤的女子.

sentences.en: He stood before the stretcher and bowed gravely in the traditional Hopei manner.
sentences.cn: 他到担架前面按河北的传统规矩恭敬地鞠了一躬.

sentences.en: He was carried off on a stretcher.
His colleagues, with incredible speed, had already assembled their stretcher.
sentences.cn: 他的同事已经以令人难以置信的速度安装好了担架.

sentences.en: Lift the stretcher so that the front handles are supported by wall.
sentences.cn: 提高担架,将担架前把手支撑在墙头上.

sentences.en: She was clearly in tremendous pain as she was carried off the track on a stretcher.
sentences.cn: 在被担架抬下跑道时,她明显处在巨大的痛苦中.

sentences.en: Stainless steel, combination lock, acrylic paint, pencil, canvas and stretcher.
sentences.cn: 不锈钢, 结合锁, 丙烯颜料, 铅笔, 麻布和担架.

sentences.en: Stewart was trying to clear a path for the stretcher.
sentences.cn: 斯图尔特在努力给担架开路。

sentences.en: The man on the stretcher over me has a hemorrhage.
sentences.cn: 我上边那担架上的人在流血.

sentences.en: The stretcher - bearers saluted and said thank you.
The two ambulance attendants quickly put Plover on a stretcher and got him into the ambulance.
sentences.cn: 两名救护人员迅速地将普洛弗放到担架上抬进救护车里。

sentences.en: They crowded more closely around the stretcher.
sentences.cn: 他们在担架旁围得更紧了。

sentences.en: They wheeled her out on the stretcher.
sentences.cn: 他们用担架床把她推了出去。

sentences.en: We carried the wounded man on a stretcher.
sentences.cn: 我们用担架抬这位伤员.

words.tran_cn: 伸展，张开；vi. 伸展；adj. 可伸缩的；n. 伸展，延伸

trans.tran_cn: 担架，延伸器，顺边砖，框架结构的横档
trans.tran_en: a type of bed used for carrying someone who is too injured or ill to walk
